name: Delaying the Waking World
description:
We all want that extra minute of sleep.

In this simple bullet hell game, you must stay asleep as long as you can by staying alive in your dreams, running away from the ever approaching wall and dodging never ending bombardments of bullets.   Survive, and stay in the dream world.

Survive, and delay the coming of the waking world.

Made in under 72 hours for the 50th Ludum Dare.

Controls:

- WASD to move

- Use mouse to interact

Guide:

The green items heal you, or in other words, keeps you a bit further from waking up.

The blue/purple items slows down the approaching wall a bit.

The yellow items are tokens, which you can collect along the way for fun.

Beware the alarm clock.
